workshop.internal.entities

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • workshop.internal.entities.WorkshopEntityAbstract
      • workshop.internal.entities.Trackable
        • workshop.internal.entities.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<WorkshopEntity>, WorkshopEntity

    @Entity
public class Task
extends Trackable
    Belongs to a particular Order. Cannot be deleted if that Order is already finished. Can be appointed to an Employee in the creation time or can be self-appointed that's why 'appointedTo' field can be null
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • price

        @PositiveOrZero(groups={javax.validation.groups.Default.class,PersistenceValidation.class,MergingValidation.class},
                message="{validation.positiveOrZero}")
private @PositiveOrZero(groups={javax.validation.groups.Default.class,PersistenceValidation.class,MergingValidation.class},message="{validation.positiveOrZero}") java.math.BigDecimal price
        The sum of the all included Classifiers prices. Will be set automatically as the sum of the all included Classifiers prices. Use Task.addClassifier() of Task.deleteClassifier() to correctly set Task.price. Of course can be corrected manually. Default = 0.00

      • removeClassifier

        public void removeClassifier(@Valid
                             Classifier... classifiers)
        This method also recalculates the Price of the Task.

      • setClassifiers

        public void setClassifiers(java.util.Set<Classifier> classifiers)
        Also recalculates the overall price of the Task! Use this with careful. For deleting or addition the particular Tasks use Task.addClassifier() or Task.addClassifiers()

      • preRemove

        public void preRemove()
               throws PersistenceFailureException
        Checks if the Order this Task belongs to is not finished (finished Orders cannot be modified).
        Throws:
        PersistenceFailureException - If the Order this Task belongs to is already finished and cannot be modified. This RuntimeException is intended to break a Transaction with this removing.

      • getIdentifier

        public java.lang.Long getIdentifier()
        Description copied from interface: WorkshopEntity
        Has to have the annotation '@Column(name = 'id')' for being the Entity for JPA
        Returns:
        '@Column(name = 'id')'

      • preUpdate

        public void preUpdate()
        Forces the included Order to be pre-updated (so that that Order also be updated with this renewed Task). If this Task hasn't been given a name, it concatenates all the names of the included Classifiers for this.
        Overrides:
        preUpdate in class Trackable
